attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we think that the unemployed people of the country who have lost jobs due to the resession should be helped more than they have been. I think that it is unfair that immigrants who come in to the country can find work straight away, and also those who are claiming jobseekers while activly working can have everything.

i ask you, people, those who are in favour in getting more help to sign my petition thankyou

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
